reviews.name: Mary Poppins (50th Anniversary Edition) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: After seeing Mr. banks which was wonderful I just had to see Mary Poppins from a new perceptive. Wonderful movie for children and adults.
reviews.title: Watch for the first time or again and again.

reviews.name: Mary Poppins (50th Anniversary Edition) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: So happy to own this movie. Love the different options for sing-a-longs. I forget how much I love this movie until I watch it.
reviews.title: LOVE IT.

reviews.name: Mary Poppins (50th Anniversary Edition) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Mary Poppins is a classic. After seeing Saving Mr. Banks, I realized I had never seen Mary Poppins. It is a wonderful movie and should be part of everyone's collection. I know folks have varying thoughts on Walt Disney, but he was a movie genius.
reviews.title: Should be in everyones collection

reviews.name: Mary Poppins (50th Anniversary Edition) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 because after scouring the internet Walmart's price was the best-the sugar :)
reviews.title: What can I say? It's Mary Poppins!

reviews.name: Mary Poppins (50th Anniversary Edition) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Fun for the whole family, all ages and walks of life included. An absolute must for your children.
reviews.title: An excellent story, widely appreciated
